title: Voxonomics 1-1
author: VD
content_html: Here’s the first experiment in Voxonomics… although apparently not in podcasting per se. For a variety of reasons, the RSS feed I created doesn’t appear to be validating. I’m not sure I’m going to do this every week or not, we’ll have to see if it’s of any interest first.
content_text:
Here’s the first experiment in
Voxonomics
… although apparently not in podcasting per se.  For a variety of reasons, the RSS feed I created doesn’t appear to be validating.  I’m not sure I’m going to do this every week or not, we’ll have to see if it’s of any interest first.
